1.content:
You were sick of your life. You couldnt find any meaning to it or enjoyment of living so you decide to join a project. It was a project to reach out to other universes. They apperently spend 6 years on development ti create a portal to the other universe. You knew that no one had come back but what did you have to loose right? The next day you jumped into the portal.

For hours you thought you were dead. It was dark and no sign of life was there. Suddenly you woken up by the sound of a switch as it got bright again. You noticed that you were in a store. It looked like a normal supermarket. Suddenly a worker came towards you and stood right infront of you.
"These damn choose your own toy things are a blast. They sell out so fast i know why..." you noticed that she had a giant buldge in her pants and it was growing and growing. The worker squads down and looked at you straight in the eyes. "If you dont get bought then your comming with me~" You gulped as she went away and officially opened the shop. It didnt took long till people start taking the toys left and right from you till someone grabbed you..

Sara
A 18 year old girl with brown hair and green eyes.
She always dreamed of having one of these toys and you will be her first one

jasmin
A 20 year old girl with black hair. Her buldge was enormous and she looked like a goth girl

jamie
A 21 year old girl with oily blonde hair. She didnt look very hygenic and overall not really someone you want to belong to
1.title: How could it get worst?

choices: Sara wants to have sex with you.

She wants to make you the new butler.
11.content:
A girl with brown hair grabs you. "Ooh, i will pick you. It doesn't stand out much but you are also kinda cute, you're perfect". She said with sparkling eyes, but you also notice the big bulge in her skirt. You are really scared of the whole situation but while you are lost in thoughts, you are already outside the store facing a limousine. "Hey, come in". The girl said, apparantly she is rich.

During the ride, you finally get the courage to vocally question the situation. "Um... what are you going to do with me?". She looks to you with a surprised face and responds. "What are you talking about? It's not like i can use the chauffeur to satisfy my desires. I had to wait until my 18th birthday to buy you, so i hope you live up my expectations. By the way, my name is Sara. And your name from now on will be Dog". You are incredulous, wondering how she can say things like that so easily. "D-Dog!? I don't know if I like this kinda of treatment". Sara responds simply to that, "Don't worry, you will get used hihi". She is so strange, she say things like that with a pure smile but she doesn't seems evil, perhaps that's the way the children from this dimension are raised? From that point on, the silence dominated the vehicle, until minutes later when you all arrive at Sara's mansion.

You and Sara enter through the giant front door. "This can be a hindrance to my mission". You think out loud. "What did you say?". Sara obviously question that. "Ah, no-nothing". She then grab your hand and run pulling you. "Come on, Dog, there is something i want do to! Haha!". She is certainly a cheerful girl after all. But what happens next?
11.title: Sara
